name: Flamax Wire Industries
overview: Established in the year 1990, we, “Flamax Wire Industries”, are involved in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a vast array of Wires, Cables, Hoses and Thermocouples. Our range of products encompasses PTFE Wires, Silicone Wires & Cables, Thermocouple Wires, Fiber Glass Wires, Silicone Rubber Coated Fiberglass Sleeves, Asbestos Wires, RTD Cables and Industrial Cables. Also, we offer Unarmored Cables, Compensating Grade Cables, S.S. Bellow Hoses, G. I. Braided Hoses, Head Type Thermocouples, K-Type Thermocouples and Thermocouples. The range made available by us is manufactured using high-grade material, which is sourced from most trusted vendors of market with the aid of our procuring agents. Our product-line is highly appreciated by clients for its longer service life, shock & corrosion resistance, excellent tensile strength, fine finish and dimensional accuracy. Available in variegated specifications; our range is used in paper plants, power plants, tire plants, steel plants, chemical plants, fertilizer plants, aluminum industries, oil refineries and plywood industries.
